name: xmetdmdm

stmt.origin: syl6req(c1, cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cxp(c1, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
stmt.pretty: syl6req(c1, dom(dom(c0)), dom((c1 × c1)), c0 ∈(*Met ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(cdm(cdm(c0)), cdm(cxp(c1, c1))))
-| wceq(cdm(cxp(c1, c1)), c1)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ c1 = dom(dom(c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ dom(dom(c0))= dom((c1 × c1)))
⊣ dom((c1 × c1))= c1

-| wceq(cdm(cxp(c1, c1)), c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ c1 = dom(dom(c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ dom(dom(c0))= dom((c1 × c1)))
⊣ dom((c1 × c1))= c1
